author: adityapatwardhan
body:
- Nunit logs will be created to tests.
- Logs are copied to the Azure share.
- Pester is run with -Quiet
- Elevated and unelevated runs for tests with appropriate tags

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @PowerShell/powershell-maintainers I believe this is ready for merge. Can someone have a look?

title: Added functionality to improve failure triaging
